EmailTemplate.name: Overdue Report - English
EmailTemplate.subject: {!FundingAwardRequirement.Organization_Name__c}: Overdue {!FundingAwardRequirement.Type} - {!FundingAwardRequirement.Name} - {!FundingAwardRequirement.Grant_Amount__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings from AJWS!
I hope this email finds you well.
Our records show that {!FundingAwardRequirement.Organization_Name__c} has a {!FundingAwardRequirement.Type} for the Project "{!FundingAwardRequirement.project_title__c}" ({!FundingAwardRequirement.Grant_Amount__c}) (#{!FundingAwardRequirement.Number__c}) that was due on ({!FundingAwardRequirement.DueDate})
Please note, organizations with overdue reports are not eligible to receive funding from AJWS. Please send us your final report so that we can learn about the accomplishments of your project.
If you have already submitted your final report, or if you have worked out an alternate reporting schedule with your program officer, please let me know.
All the best,
